leetcode上比较简单的一道题了，一个二叉树，结点用0～9的数表示，让你求所有从根到叶的连起来的数的加和。

leetcode

Longest Consecutive Sequenceby hombo

Given an unsorted array of integers, find the length of the longest consecutive elements sequence. For example,

Given [100, 4, 200, 1, 3, 2],

The longest consecutive elements sequence is [1, 2, 3, 4]. Return its length: 4.

Your algorithm should run in O(n) complexity.

此题可以用hashmap在O(n) 时间复杂度解决。

 Read More

void swap(int *a , int *b){
    a = ________ ;
    b = ________ ;
    a = ________ ;
}
